title: Evelyn Stealer Malware Abuses VS Code Extensions to Steal Developer Credentials and Crypto
full_text: Evelyn Stealer Malware Abuses VS Code Extensions to Steal Developer Credentials and Crypto. Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed details of a malware campaign that's targeting software developers with a new information stealer called Evelyn Stealer by weaponizing the Microsoft Visual Studio Code (VS Code) extension ecosystem.
